mapper.select: SELECT type, obj_id as objId, IF ( type = 'ACTIVE', ( SELECT b.pic FROM tb_active b WHERE a.obj_id = b.active_id ), ( SELECT c.offer_pic FROM tb_offer c WHERE a.obj_id = c.offer_id ) ) AS pic FROM tb_index_recommend a ORDER BY updated_at DESC LIMIT 0, 5
mapper.insert: insert into tb_index_recommend (type, obj_id, created_at, updated_at) values (#{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), now())
mapper.delete: delete from tb_index_recommend where `type` = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and obj_id = #{objId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
